Welcome to markowitz-portfolio’s documentation!¶

The stock_selection module includes modules needed import data and perform analysis to select a basket of stocks using Markowitz’s efficient frontier portfolio theory.

Overview¶

This module contains the following classes:

  • Example1

  • Example2

Usage¶

Sample text.¶

class src.stock_selection.Stock(ticker, price)¶

A single stock with the relevant price history. Contains internal message to calculate various statistics related to the stock.

ticker¶

The ticker symbol of the stock as shown on relevant exchanges.

sharpe_ratio¶

Holds ratio of excess returns (Portfolio Return - Risk Free Rate) to portfolio standard deviation.

sortino_ratio¶

Holds ratio of excess returns (Portfolio Return - Risk Free Rate) to downside portfolio standard deviation
